<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Despot](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3614)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 157

**Perception** +11

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Diabolic](/Languages.aspx?ID=117)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +11, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) +13, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +11, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +13, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45) +13, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46) +11, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +13, [Warfare Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +2

**Con** +0

**Int** +4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Persistent Lies** Any creature deceived by the despot's [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) skill believes the deception more readily on the next day. Any later Perception checks attempted against the despot's Deception DC take a –2 circumstance penalty, as do other creatures' attempts to convince the creature otherwise, such as through [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) or further Deception.

**Items**
[lesser darkvision elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3305), [lesser healing potion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2943) (2), [Spiked Gauntlet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=11)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +13 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 60

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
spiked gauntlet +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Free-Hand](/Traits.aspx?ID=181)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 piercing

**Divine Spontaneous Spells** DC 23, attack +14
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Ignition](/Spells.aspx?ID=1565), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Void Warp](/Spells.aspx?ID=1745)
- **1st**
[Bane](/Spells.aspx?ID=18), [Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266) (4 slots)
- **2nd**
[Blood Vendetta](/Spells.aspx?ID=675), [Calm](/Spells.aspx?ID=1458), [Floating Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=1533), [See the Unseen](/Spells.aspx?ID=1663) (4 slots)
- **3rd**
[Chilling Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=36), [Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=104), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (3 slots)

**Sorcerer Bloodline Spells** DC 23, 1 Focus Point
- **3rd**
[Diabolic Edict](/Spells.aspx?ID=498)

**Sorcerous Potency**   When the despot Casts a Spell from a spell slot that deals damage, they gain a status bonus to the spell's initial damage equal to the spell's rank.

**Tongue of Flame**   When the despot casts [_charm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1463), [_diabolic edict_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2099), [_enthrall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1516), or [_floating flame_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1533), either a target takes 1 fire damage per spell rank, or the despot gains a +2 status bonus to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) checks for 1 round.

</column>
